settings.title: AUTO-REPLENISH PROGRAM
settings.text: Watch your favourite products show up at your door automatically and save up to 20%!

settings.title: Effortless loyalty points
settings.text: Receive loyalty points on every delivery and purchase you make

settings.title: Tailor your experience
settings.text: Receive what you need, when you need it, no more or no less

settings.title: Free delivery
settings.text: Reliable, fast and convenient. The level of service that you deserve

settings.title: Crtl, Alt or Del
settings.text: Pause or cancel your plan after a minimum of 3 delivery cycles

settings.title: Select the delivery frequency according to your preference
Change the delivery frequency anytime, and feel free to pause or cancel after 3 delivery cycles
Contact us at support@calecimprofessional.com if you need any help
Kick back as the good stuff comes your way
